title: Cowboy Up
description: "Never fall in love with a cowboy." These words were drilled into Emily Sterling's head since her parents divorced over twenty years ago. But now Emily has returned to her father's ranch... only to find herself face-to-face with jawdroppingly hot rancher Clay Whitaker.Clay is the resident stud expert at the Last Chance Ranch and isn't so keen on "spoiled" city slickers...until Emily arrives. Now he's showing Emily just what a ranch--and a cowboy--has to offer. And luckily for him, it's an offer Emily can't refuse...
author: Vicki Lewis Thompson
